article_title: Emulex to Cut Jobs, Close Massachusetts Plant
article_text:
Emulex Corp. on Wednesday said it would cut about 10% of its workforce and close its engineering facility in Bolton, Mass., as the chip and networking company moves to scale back its connectivity business.

The layoffs come a month after Emulex, which makes network connectivity, monitoring and management software and hardware, disclosed plans to cut annual costs by about $30 million, buy back up to about 30% of its stock and name...
